fields.summary: Disable SARG leaf creation for timestamp column until ORC-135

fields.description: Until ORC-135 is committed and orc version is updated in hive, disable SARG creation forÂ date columns in hive.
fields.summary: Disable SARG leaf creation for date column until ORC-135

comments.body:
Makes sense to me +1
This is applicable to branch-1 only, ORC is separate after that.
[~prasanth_j] does this make sense?

branch-1 has different type conversions for PPD.. this may still be applicable. the DATE/timestamp ppd is subject to timezone issues anyway. so safer to disable it.

+1
The patch will fail tests unless it is renamed to have branch-1.patch.
branch-1 tests are all screwed up anyway :)

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12944233/HIVE-20756.01-branch-1.patch
